New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored 81 runs off 74 balls, the fastest fifty in the match
Pakistan successfully chased down a target of 205 to win the match
Key Match Events: Bangladesh became the first team to be eliminated from the World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan discussed his batting performance and team strategy
Pakistan's bowlers performed well in the early stages of the innings
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam praised his team's performance and expressed confidence for upcoming matches
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan reflected on the team's struggles and future prospects
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Pakistan's first win in four attempts
Bangladesh's poor performance led to their elimination
Fakhar Zaman's innings was crucial for Pakistan's victory
